heading: Septets.
general-note: Here are entered collections of compositions for seven instruments belonging to various families and in various combinations. Collections of compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for a single combination of instruments, and individual works, are entered under this heading followed by a parenthetical qualifier with the names of the instruments or the term "unspecified instrument(s).".

Compositions for seven bowed stringed instruments are entered under. String septets;. for seven wind instruments under. Wind septets;. for seven brass instruments under. Brass septets;. for seven woodwind instruments under. Woodwind septets;. and for seven plucked stringed instruments under. Plucked instrument septets..
Compositions for seven percussionists are entered under. Percussion ensembles..
Compositions for seven solo voices are entered under. Sacred vocal septets. or. Vocal septets..
